setting.time: 1930s Moscow, several days after manuscript burning
setting.location: Moscow psychiatric hospital, white-walled patient room
setting.weather: Interior, soft natural light from high barred windows

characters.appearance: Man, late 30s, dark hair, now clean but hollow-eyed, thinner, worn expression
characters.clothing: Simple white hospital gown, slippers, clean but institutional appearance
characters.position: Sitting on edge of narrow hospital bed, staring at empty hands
characters.action: Moving fingers as if still writing, lips moving silently

characters.appearance: Young man, late 20s, blonde hair, athletic build, now also institutionalized
characters.clothing: Similar white hospital clothing, more disheveled, bandages on hands
characters.position: Pacing by barred window, agitated movement
characters.action: Gesticulating wildly while speaking to unseen listeners

characters.appearance: Hospital attendant, middle-aged man, 40s, kind but tired face
characters.clothing: White medical coat, simple trousers, practical shoes, clipboard in hand
characters.position: Standing in doorway observing both patients
characters.action: Making notes while watching patient behavior with professional concern

scene.mainElements: Sparse hospital room with two beds, barred windows, white walls and simple furniture
scene.details: Iron bed frames with thin mattresses, small side table with water pitcher, barred windows casting striped shadows, white-painted walls with occasional scuff marks, linoleum floor, single overhead light fixture
scene.background: Corridor visible through open door, other patient rooms partially visible, hospital sounds echoing
scene.atmosphere: Institutional safety for broken minds, sanctuary from hostile world, sterile environment contrasting with rich inner lives of patients, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from room entrance, capturing both patients and institutional setting
composition.focus: Two creative minds finding refuge in psychiatric sanctuary
composition.depth: Foreground: hospital room furnishings; middle ground: two patients in different states of distress; background: hospital corridor and institutional environment

colorPalette.usageNotes: Soft, dreamy colors that blend into each other

rendering.detailLevel: selective focus, some areas sharp, others dissolving
